body:
Eren loves mikasa. 
Levi X Petra
Well in manga ending even loves mikasa all the time before he died, he just confess to arming it's  kinda sad.

@brokenstvrr man just shut up if you have read the manga you know that Eren has a purpose and we still don’t know why he’s doing this so for the moment, you don’t’ know anything and come on we all know that Mikasa and Eren is somehow going to happen, either romantically or tragically,  so these shit are just here because authors don’t read manga and just watch anime or either they are shipping something that will never happen .
Despite this being somewhat incest I still really like it. The art is really nice and you can see how wholesome it is despite it being in Japanese. So its a favorite from me.
@itsmeclark if u haven't read the Manga shut up thx, eren is a toxic crazy bitch rn, I don't think he deserves mikasa more than Levi or Jean
My god another levi x Mikasa shipper
Mikasa and Levi it's better than Mikasa and Eren 🤮

Seriously? Again, why have to grip the "empty shell"?
This is the biggest insult to the character of the original Manga.
V Agreed please do the world a favor
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
